summary: This document is a daily lieutenant's log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, NY, covering three shifts on July 8, 2019. It details routine prison operations, counts, and inmate movements, including the fact that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was taken to court and returned that day. The log also notes an inmate at a local hospital under USMS guard.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054. Logged as being taken out to court at 1:20 PM and returning from court at 5:49 PM, then moved from ZA to HA unit at 5:53 PM.

events.title: Epstein Taken to Court
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was logged as being taken out to court at 1:20 PM.

events.title: Epstein Returns from Court
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) returned from court at 5:49 PM and was subsequently moved from the ZA unit to the HA unit at 5:53 PM.

events.title: Fire Suppression System Failure
events.description: At 4:30 PM, an announcement was made that the fire suppression pump went down, requiring the institution to conduct fire watch protocol.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on July 8, 2019, with registration number #76318-054.
Epstein was taken out to court on the afternoon of July 8, 2019, and returned to the facility later that evening.
Upon his return from court, Epstein was moved from the ZA unit to the HA unit within the prison.
The log indicates another inmate was at a local hospital under the guard of the U.S. Marshals Service (USMS).
The document is a routine prison operations log, detailing counts, equipment checks, and inmate movements, providing a snapshot of Epstein's custody on a specific day.
